product_name: Mountain House Just In Case Classic Assorted Freeze-Dried Food Bucket
long_description: The Mountain House Just In Case Classic Assorted Freeze-Dried Food Bucket makes it easy to keep a total of 29 servings' worth of food on hand for emergencies or camping.
